mapper.sql: id, serialNumber, name, contact, phone, address, logoPath, score, declaration, summary, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select:
select asp.id, asp.serialNumber, asp.name, asp.contact, asp.phone, asp.address, asp.logoPath, asp.score, asp.declaration, asp.summary, asp.createTime, asp.updateTime from t_activity_sponsor asp
limit ${index}, ${row}

SELECT asp.id, asp.serialNumber, asp.name, asp.contact, asp.phone, asp.address, asp.logoPath, asp.score, asp.declaration, asp.summary, asp.createTime, asp.updateTime, a.id AS a_id, a.status AS a_status, a.title AS a_title, a.summary AS a_summary, a.sponsorId AS a_sponsorId, a.homePath AS a_homePath, a.serialNumber AS a_serialNumber, a.fromTime AS a_fromTime, a.toTime AS a_toTime, a.address AS a_address, a.clickCount AS a_clickCount, a.likeCount AS a_likeCount, a.shareCount AS a_shareCount, a.releaseTime AS a_releaseTime, a.createTime AS a_createTime from t_activity_sponsor asp inner join t_activity a on a.sponsorId = asp.id
and asp.id = #{value}
